glsa.title: iproute local Denial of Service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: The iproute package allows local users to cause a denial of service.

background.p: iproute is a set of tools for managing linux network routing and advanced features.

description.p: It has been reported that iproute can accept spoofed messages on the kernel netlink interface from local users. This could lead to a local Denial of Service condition.

impact.p: Local users could cause a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: A workaround is not currently known for this issue. All users are advised to upgrade to the latest version of the affected package.

resolution.p: All iproute users should upgrade to version 20010824-r5 or later:
